nodes.text: A luxury hunting lodge operated business on the Bothan homeworld of Bothawui during the Galactic Civil War. In 3.5 ABY, a Bothan clan hired a team of undercover Alliance Intelligence agents to embark on an all-expenses-paid hunting trip, including a stay at the luxury lodge, to capture a pair of wild krak'jya beasts. To sweeten the deal, the agents were offered an extra two-week stay at the lodge following the conclusion of the hunt.
